action.description: No time for story!* This is adrenaline fueled, in-your-face kaboom candy. *Well, actually there are stories... explosion stories.
action.name: Action

adventure.description: Epic and exciting tales of risk, danger and reward. There will be many miles on foot. Is it treasure you seek?
adventure.name: Adventure

bishonen.description: A Japanese term literally meaning "beautiful boy"... of which there are no shortage here. DREAMY!
bishonen.name: Bishonen

bishoujo.description: A Japanese term literally meaning "beautiful girl". If that sounds like your thing, you'll find lots of them here!
bishoujo.name: Bishoujo

comedy.description: If we need to explain comedy to you, then it sounds like you DEFINITELY need to watch something in this category.
comedy.name: Comedy

documentary.description: See the people behind your favourite anime! Some of them are just as quirky as the characters they create.
documentary.name: Documentary

drama.description: Not to be sensationalist, but this situation is pretty serious and we think you need to take a moment to think about the ramifications... Now THAT'S Drama!
drama.name: Drama

fan-service.description: A harmless bit of titilation that can also be a heck of a lot of fun, and especially rewarding for dedicated viewers. Hard to watch with glasses (i.e. fogging).
fan-service.name: Fan Service

fantasy.description: Dare you enter a world of swords, magic and monsters? Accept the quest and become a hero!
fantasy.name: Fantasy

gaming.description: +5 attack to all series under this category
gaming.name: Gaming

harem.description: One guy. A bevy of girls. Drawn together by circumstance. Romantic fumblings and/or hijinks ensue.
harem.name: Harem

historical.description: They told you you'd never learn anything from anime. They were wrong (sort of).
historical.name: Historical

idol.description: Reach for your dreams! Everyone can become an idol if they believe!
idol.name: Idol

isekai.description: Meaning "another world". Getting transported, trapped or reborn into another world, usually by way of a truck.
isekai.name: Isekai

kids.description: The best family and kids shows ready to stream on AnimeLab
kids.name: Kids

magical-girl.description: The life of a magical girl is never as whimscial as the word 'magical' suggests. Should be called 'Introspective Girl', really.
magical-girl.name: Magical Girl

martial-arts.description: Kung-fu, Karate, Grappling, Wrestling - if it's even vaguely a martial-art, you can guarantee there's a show dedicated to it.
martial-arts.name: Martial Arts

mecha.description: Two words: Giant Robots. If you require more incentive... welp... Â¯\_(ãƒ„)_/Â¯
mecha.name: Mecha

moe.description: Moe is slang for 'strong affection'... or, if you like 'feels'. So. Yes. These are stories about feels.
moe.name: Moe

mystery.description: What was that? Who was she? What year is it? Who's the president??
mystery.name: Mystery

offbeat.description: Looking for something different? Here's some off the wall anime that sometimes defy description.
offbeat.name: Offbeat

reverse-harem.description: One girl. A bevy of guys. Drawn together by circumstance. Romantic fumblings and/or hijinks ensue. Probably less panty shots than in your normal harem.
reverse-harem.name: Reverse Harem

school.description: School yourself with these textbook on-campus shows.
school.name: School

sci-fi.description: Need an introduction to this genre? Three words. Watch. Astro. Boy.
sci-fi.name: Sci Fi

shonen.description: On paper, these are shows for boys. But in reality, Shonen will be in the wheelhouse of anyone (Boy, Girl, Gramps, Goldfish) who likes charismatic characters getting into scrapes and adventures across a more than reasonable amount of episodes.
shonen.name: Shonen

slice-of-life.description: Today I bought milk, oranges and taco mix. Then I bumped into Beryl, who was returning a set of plates. End scene.
slice-of-life.name: Slice of Life

space.description: "So, let me get this right. It's exactly the same as a battleship, but it flies in space?" *applause*
space.name: Space

sports.description: Step up your game with these competitive shows. Sweat. Sweat. Sweat.
sports.name: Sports

super-power.description: Wish you had the power to fell a foe with one punch? There's a show about that!
super-power.name: Super Power

supernatural.description: We've all had a long-haired hippy crawl backwards out of our TVs, right?
supernatural.name: Supernatural

yaoi.description: The history of Yaoi is long and may appear hard to get a hold of, but if you go deep enough, you will come to understand it.
yaoi.name: Yaoi

yuri.description: In the years to come, historians will say these girls were just "very good friends", but we know the truth.
yuri.name: Yuri
